title: Pay, Send and Save Money with PayPal | PayPal US
text: Send Send in seconds. Receive Request money easily. Split Simply split the bill with friends and family. Pool Pool money up front for group gifts and more.10 Tap to pay in stores with the PayPal Debit Card1 and earn rewards2 online with PayPal checkout. Adidas 1-800 flowers.com Apparel Restaurants Groceries Sony Origins Get hundreds of cash back offers.3 Also get 5% on purchases in your monthly category3 when you check out with your PayPal Debit Card. Instacart Nobull Ticketmaster Rideshare and Public Transit Fuel Paid every two weeks. No late fees. Won't affect your credit score to apply.4 With $0 down. No sign-up fees or late fees.5 Buy an item you’d like to purchase now but would prefer to pay for over time. Earn 3% cash back when you check out with PayPal and 1.5% on all other Mastercard purchases.6 Enjoy special financing on all qualifying travel purchases posted to your account by September 30, 2026.7 Plus, pay over time on all purchases of $149+ when you check out with PayPal.7 Your payments are encrypted and we don’t share your full financial info Send in seconds. It's free to set up, FDIC insured with and held at Synchrony Bank–and you can roll in all the cash back you earn with PayPal so you earn even more. Crypto curious? Confidently buy, sell, and transfer your crypto on PayPal. Get peace of mind knowing we don’t share your full financial information.12 Get the app
